attributes.title: Fifth Force of Universe Is Ability of Our Consciousness to Elongate Time & Experience True Freedom
attributes.description:
13 APR 2020 - MONDAY 
*PARAMASHIVA'S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA THROUGH HIS DIVINE HOLINESS NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM: 

*PARAMASHIVA WILL REVEAL THE TRUTHS ABOUT THE COSMOS. O HUMANITY! ALIGN YOURSELF TO THESE GREAT TRUTHS. 

*JUST AS YOU EXPERIENCE THIS UNIVERSE, THERE ARE MULTIDIMENSIONAL UNIVERSES. HOW YOU EXPERIENCE YOURSELF IN MULTI-LEVELS AT VARIOUS MOODS, AT VARIOUS TIMES, WITH VARIOUS POWERFUL COGNITIONS OR POWERLESSNESS INSIDE YOUR BODY, SAME WAY, UNIVERSE EXISTS IN MULTIDIMENSIONS. 

*WHEN YOU OPERATE WITH POWERFUL COGNITIONS, YOU ATTRACT AND EXPERIENCE, MANIFEST THE POWERFUL DIMENSIONS OF THE UNIVERSE; BEINGS OF THE POWERFUL DIMENSIONS OF THE UNIVERSE START SUPPORTING YOU, HELPING, YOU, ENCOURAGING YOU AND AWAKENING YOU, FULFILLING YOU.

*WHEN YOU OPERATE WITH LIFE-NEGATIVE PRINCIPLES, THE LIFE-NEGATIVE DIMENSIONS OF THE UNIVERSE GRAVITATES YOU; LIFE-NEGATIVE BEINGS LIVING IN THOSE UNIVERSES SUPPORT YOU AND TRY TO FULFILL THEIR ASPIRATIONS THROUGH YOU.

*TIME AND SPACE IS NOT SAME FOR ALL BEINGS EVEN THOUGH THE TIME ZONE AND THE MACHINES TO MEASURE THE TIME AND THE UNIT OF TIME MAY BE SAME FOR ALL OF YOU. 

*UNDERSTAND THIS: UNIT OF TIME AND MACHINES WITH WHICH YOU MEASURE YOUR TIME MAY BE SAME FOR ALL YOU HUMAN BEINGS, BUT TIME IS NOT SAME FOR ALL OF YOU. 

*EACH ONE OF YOU EXPERIENCE DIFFERENT KALA - TIME. EVEN IN YOUR OWN LIFE, YOU EXPERIENCE DIFFERENT TYPES OF KALA AT DIFFERENT TIMES. 

*MORE YOU ARE LIFE-POSITIVE, TIME ELONGATES, GIVES ITS BEST SPACE FOR YOU. MORE YOU BECOME LIFE-NEGATIVE, LIFE SHRINKS AND GIVES THE SUFFOCATING EXPERIENCE IN YOU.
 
*TIME ELONGATES OR SHRINKS WITHIN THE ELASTICITY CALLED ‘MATTER’ OF THE SPACE. 

*SPACE IS ALSO PART OF THE MATTER FROM THE HIGHER ZONES OF THE SPACE. SPACE IS THE REFINED MATTER FROM THE LOWER ZONES LIKE LENGTH, BREADTH, DEPTH, TIME, BUT SPACE IS STILL A MATTER FROM HIGHER ZONES, THE HIGHER DIMENSIONS.

*WHETHER THE FOUR FUNDAMENTAL FORCES OF THE NATURE HUMANITY IS ABLE TO LOGICALLY UNDERSTAND: 1) THE POWER OF GRAVITY, 2) ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE, 3) WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE AND 4) STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE, OR THE POWERS WHICH ORDINARY HUMAN BEINGS DON'T HAVE ACCESS AS ON NOW, WHEN THE SPACE-TIME ELASTICITY IS EXPERIENCED BY AN INDIVIDUAL, HE MANIFESTS A POWER CALLED ‘ABILITY TO SHIFT HIS BEING FROM ANY VERTICAL TIMEZONE’. 

*IN YOUR DAY-TO-DAY LIFE, YOU CAN EXPERIENCE HOW BASED ON THE MOOD AND THE COGNITION YOU CARRY, EITHER YOU FEEL SUFFOCATED OR LIBERATED. 

*MORE CHRONOLOGICAL TIME YOU SPEND IN LIBERATED SPACE, MORE YOU WILL BE LEVITATED. YOU WILL BE PULLED TOWARDS THE LIBERATED WORLD. THE MORE TIME YOU SPEND IN SUFFOCATED SPACE, THE MORE YOU WILL BE PULLED TOWARDS SUFFOCATED SPACE.  

*NARAKA AS DESCRIBED IN PURANAS IS NOT ‘HELL’ UNDERSTOOD BY HUMAN BEINGS. NARAKA IS NOT GIVEN TO YOU IF YOU BELIEVE OR DON'T BELIEVE IN SOME IDEAS. 

*SWARGA IS NOT THE HEAVEN ORDINARY HUMAN BEINGS UNDERSTAND - SWARGA UNDERSTOOD BY YOUR ‘TIME-SPACE ELASTICITY ELONGATION POSSIBILITY’.

*WHEN YOUR SPACE BEHAVES WITH ELASTICITY AND MANIFESTS YOUR TIME, EITHER BY ELONGATING IT OR SHRINKING IT, YOU MANIFEST SWARGA OR NARAKA IN YOU. 

*THE TIME-SPACE-SHIFT-ELASTICITY BASED ON WHICH ELONGATING OR SHRINKING OF THE TIME EXPERIENCE HAPPENS IN YOUR BEING, THAT ‘SPACE’ IS YOUR IDENTITY. 

*YOUR IDENTITY, YOUR BEING, IS EXPERIENCED BY YOU. IT IS ROOTED IN YOUR ABILITY TO ELONGATE THE TIME OR SHRINK THE TIME. THAT IS WHERE YOU EXPERIENCE PERSONAL FREEDOM. 

*YOU ARE GIVEN ABSOLUTE FREEDOM IN EITHER ELONGATING YOUR TIME AND FEELING LIBERATED OR SHRINKING YOUR TIME AND FEELING SUFFOCATED. NO ONE HAS RIGHT TO ENTER INTO YOUR TIME-SPACE PLASTICITY, TIME-SPACE ELASTICITY. 

*YOUR CAPABILITY TO ELONGATE OR SHRINK YOUR TIME, YOUR ABSOLUTE EXPERIENCE OF THE FREEDOM OF YOUR INDIVIDUAL EXPERIENCE OF SWATANTRATVA - THE MOST IMPORTANT PRIDE OF YOUR IDENTITY, MOST IMPORTANT QUALITY OF YOUR IDENTITY, MOST IMPORTANT COMPONENT OF YOUR EXISTENCE, THIS IS THE FIFTH FORCE OF THE UNIVERSE - ABILITY OF YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS TO ELONGATE OR SHRINK YOUR TIME, IS VERILY AVAILABLE TO ALL OF YOU. BUT DUE TO THE DELUSION YOU EITHER UNDERSTAND IT OR INTRANALISE IT IN MEASURABLE WAY. 

*ANYONE LOOKS INTO HIS CAPABILITY TO ELONGATE OR SHRINK THE TIME, STARTS SAMYAMA - THE CAPACITY OF AN INDIVIDUAL.

*THE SAMYAMA CAPACITY OF AN INDIVIDUAL IS THE FIFTH FORCE OF YOUR NATURE AND FIFTH FORCE OF YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS. 





/level2
